## Welcome

This site hosts the **practical teaching materials** for  
[**FB2NEP: Nutritional Epidemiology & Public Health**](https://www.reading.ac.uk/modules/documents?acyear=2024%252f5&modcode=FB2NEP&schoolcode=CFP%20CHEM%7CCFP%20FOODBI%7CCFP%20PHARM).

The data used throughout are **synthetic and reproducible** — see the [provenance file](metadata/provenance.md) for details on how they were generated.

> Please familiarise yourself with this repository.  
> It is an integral part of the **teaching** and will be used in the **assessment**.
